title: Migrate consumer/admin pages from blockMetadata to omnipubs
description: Updated all carousels, book listings, and admin pages to use the omnipubs table instead of blockMetadata for book data. This includes updating the carousel API, carousel-card component, book-carousel component, and getJobCount function.

title: Debug ingestion pipeline and add title deletion
description:
Debug ingestion pipeline to find where it's breaking, and add ability to delete titles (with all associated data).

## Part 1: Debug Ingestion Pipeline
- Create health check endpoint to test all service connections
- Create step-by-step test endpoints to isolate failures
- Add verbose logging to Trigger.dev tasks

## Part 2: Title Deletion
- Delete from 8 DB tables: blockTimestamps, blockMetadata, bookVoices, reporting, collectionBooks, jobs, ingestionStatus, omnipubs
- Delete R2 audio files under {bookId}/ prefix
- Cancel running Trigger.dev tasks before deletion
- Add delete UI to admin books table with confirmation dialog
